statements: SELECT user_id, transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, description, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, description FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE description LIKE 'Payment%';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = '6e8d4bd2-209d-4bbf-84b8-13c6f547c6e5'
SELECT description, amount FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM UserTransactionHistory ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, amount FROM UserTransactionHistory WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, email FROM UserCredentials WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE username LIKE 'user%';
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM UserTransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM UserTransactionHistory WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM UserCredentials WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, amount FROM UserTransactionHistory WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, last_login FROM UserCredentials WHERE user_id = 102;
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM UserTransactionHistory WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_cards WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, card_number FROM user_cards WHERE card_number LIKE '****5678';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT u.username, p.amount FROM users u JOIN payment_transactions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.amount < 500 ORDER BY p.amount ASC;
SELECT u.username, p.amount, c.card_number FROM users u JOIN payment_transactions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN user_cards c ON u.user_id = c.user_id ORDER BY p.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, amount, status FROM invoices WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = '3b6f2f19-4b29-4f32-90e8-df3961fa3302';
SELECT invoice_id, amount, status FROM invoices WHERE status = 'unpaid' AND amount > 500 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.method_type, t.amount FROM users u JOIN payment_methods p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT u.username, a.address_line, a.city, a.state, a.zip_code FROM users u JOIN addresses a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 2;
